summary: Witness the formation of the legendary Public Security Section 9. When a clandestine organization hacks every car in the city, Kusanagi recruits a lethal team of cyber operatives to clamp down on the chaos and make the city safe again.
cast: Maaya Sakamoto|Ikkyu Juku|Ken'ichirô Matsuda|Tomoyuki Dan|Takurou Nakakuni|Yôji Ueda|Kazuya Nakai|Miyuki Sawashiro|Ikuya Sawaki|Takako Fuji|Tetsuo Gotô|Madoka Shiga|Haruo Satô|Ryûichi Kijima|Yuka Keicho|Takahiro Fujiwara|Masayoshi Sugawara|Tomo Muranaka|Lynn|Tia Lynn Ballard|Anthony Bowling|Cynthia Cranz|Wyn Delano|Jason Douglas|Chuck Huber|Bill Jenkins|Jamie Marchi|Brian Mathis|Elizabeth Maxwell|Mary Elizabeth McGlynn|Skyler McIntosh|Alex Organ|Phil Parsons|Brandon Potter|Chris Rager|Christopher Sabat|Jad Saxton|Jeremy Schwartz|Marcus D. Stimac|Mark Stoddard|John Swasey|Eric Vale|David Wald|Barry Yandell|Stephanie Young
title: Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 2 - Ghost Whisper
